data.name: New Announcement Record
data.queryText:
select a.Id as announcementId,a.Name, lumen__unTitle__c as title,
[lumen__unUniversities_Selected__c] as university,[lumen__unImportant__c] as important,
[lumen__unDepartments_Selected__c] as department, [lumen__unPrograms_Selected__c] as program,
[lumen__unTerms_Selected__c] as term, [lumen__unUser_Groups_Selected__c] as userGroup, 
dateadd(minute,30,dateadd(hour,11,[lumen__unValid_From__c])) as startDate, 
dateadd(minute,30,dateadd(hour,11,[lumen__unValid_To__c])) as endDate,
a.LastModifiedDate,
case
when a.RecordTypeId='0125g000000VqgvAAC' then 'announcement'
when a.RecordTypeId='0125g000000VqgwAAC' then 'blog'
end as recordType
from {{mcpm#/entities/dataExtensions/356d0fcb-565f-ed11-ba55-f40343ce89d0/data/namePrefix}}[{{mcpm#/entities/dataExtensions/356d0fcb-565f-ed11-ba55-f40343ce89d0/data/name}}] as a
where a.Id not In(select announcementId from {{mcpm#/entities/dataExtensions/734d45b0-485c-ed11-ba55-f40343ce89d0/data/namePrefix}}[{{mcpm#/entities/dataExtensions/734d45b0-485c-ed11-ba55-f40343ce89d0/data/name}}] as m 
where a.LastModifiedDate = m.LastModifiedDate )
and [lumen__unValid_To__c] >= getUTCDate() 
and (
(datepart(day,dateadd(minute,30,dateadd(hour,11,[lumen__unValid_From__c]))) = datepart(day,getUTCDate())
and datepart(month,dateadd(minute,30,dateadd(hour,11,[lumen__unValid_From__c]))) = datepart(month,getUTCDate())
) 
or [lumen__unValid_From__c] < getUTCDate())
